articles.author: Amala Balakrishner
articles.title: Asia-Pacific markets mostly rise after Wall Street gains overnight - CNBC
articles.description: Japan's retail sales for December climbed 3.7% from the previous year, while its industrial output figures for December grew 0.3%, month on month.
articles.content:
Asia markets mostly rose Friday after Wall Street rose overnight as investors assessed Big Tech earnings.
Japan's benchmark Nikkei 225 and Topix advanced for the third straight day. The Nikkei 225 g… [+1862 chars]
